categories: Category:Members of the Brotherhood of Darkness

nodes.text: A male Advozse Sith Lord fought at the Seventh Battle of Ruusan.

This Advozse first appeared in the 2001 comic-book series Star Wars: Jedi vs. Sith, written by Darko Macan and drawn by Ramón F. Bachs. Bachs found an image of an Advozse in the "Star Wars Encyclopedia" and used it as a reference, although at that time Bachs himself did not know about the species. He did not specify that this Advosze was to be green; this was an idea of colorist Chris Blythe.
